entry.name: innerWidth
entry.title: .innerWidth()
entry.desc: Get the current computed width for the first element in the set of matched elements, including padding but not border.

longdesc.p: This method returns the width of the element, including left and right padding, in pixels.
This method is not applicable to window and document objects; for these, use .width() instead.

example.desc: Get the innerWidth of a paragraph.
